StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetTrainingProvidedRecord]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingProvidedId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT ID, TrainingFileID, TrainingDate, TrainingTypeID, TrainingProvidedTypeID, Subject, Hours, ConductedBy FROM USMC.TrainingProvided WHERE ID = @TrainingProvidedId
END
